channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-24131] KafkaSinkITCase "Detected producer leak"
item.description:

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The last error is coming from a different test. Neither the test nor the code under test is present in release-1.13.

Merged into master as da0e7dd05f486fef8922f6677d25e1fe00ea90a5 .. 85684e4aa91208a7cc06f1425bc5b7d375a48637.
Merged into 1.14 as 39d303f7a2a865eb6c1dcf3b513dc38b10aff609 .. 510c2fc09ebb9d638d258bb51ddb21ccaddb1a77.

Also raised FLINK-24182 which caused the leaks in the first place.
Again wrong ticket, probably FLINK-22056 or even FLINK-18634.
